body_html: Hm... since the tensorflow include files are not usually placed in the system directory (yet), that would be the wrong thing to do. However, as we create deb packages that actually install headers into system paths, we should do it. @josh11b, opinions?

body: Hm... since the tensorflow include files are not usually placed in the system directory (yet), that would be the wrong thing to do. However, as we create deb packages that actually install headers into system paths, we should do it. @josh11b, opinions?
